amendment.description: Amendment provides $1 million in funding within the Food and Nutrition Act for making those on the veterans' disability backlog list eligible for SNAP benefits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $1 million in funding within the Food and Nutrition Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Speier.
